item.title: Docs: Case Creation
item.description:
When a customer raises an issue, a case (ticket) is created with general details.

Once the case is created, then it is automatically dispatched to the workgroup (support engineers) with Worklog entry.

item.title: Docs: Initial Response (IR)
item.description:
Once the case is created, it is assigned to the Smart Tier-1 team. The smart T1 engineer sends the Initial response to the customer acknowledging that the ticket has been received and is under analysis.


After sending IR to the customer, smart tier-1 engineer assigns this case to the concerned support team for analysis

item.title: Docs: Custome Response to CIR
item.description: When a customer responds to the CIR, then support engineer changes the case status from Pending/Customer to Case in Progress.
